channel.title: [PI] Drops not working? [PI]
channel.description:
I tried a lot of things the drops are not working when I change them not even constant drops! The base I am using has drops and everything but when I try and add more they wont work I checked everywhere no other files running drops only npcconstant.tsm and npcdrops.tsm and npcdrops.cfg I have added stuff to all of these none will change the drops or add drops to the NPC's that don't already have drops added.
Short: None of these files will add drops.

item.title: [PI] Drops not working? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @usmanm786 usmanm786
item.description:
@usmanm786 wrote:

i used to have a server like that, there isnt a fix just get a different server

Read full topic
